definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to commute a prison sentence to a fine (Tw)

sentences.english: Changing fine penalty into other penalty is a effective way in practice.
sentences.chinese: 罰金的易科執行經實踐是行之有效的方法。

sentences.english: At most they get off by paying a small fine.
sentences.chinese: 他們至多交納小額罰金就可以脫罪。

sentences.english: I am sorry , you need to pay a fine.
Does not commute a punishment the short-term set term of imprisonment to the malicious payment, replaces the fine the payment.
sentences.chinese: 對惡意不繳納者易科短期有期徒刑，代替罰金的繳納。

sentences.english: Both face maximum forfeitures of about $1.2 million.
sentences.chinese: 雙方都面臨最高120萬美元左右的罰金。

sentences.english: That fine structure will probably increase for the coming season.
sentences.chinese: 這一罰金結構在其即將到來的賽季裏可能將提升。

sentences.english: The driver paid a fifty-dollar fine for speeding.
sentences.chinese: 司機因超速行駛付了五十美元的罰金。

sentences.english: These books are two weeks overdue. I'm sorry, you have to pay a fine.
sentences.chinese: 這些書逾期兩個星期了，對不起，你得付點罰金。

sentences.english: As long as dairy farmers' production exceeds the upper limit, farmers must pay a penalty.
sentences.chinese: 奶農只要產量超過相應的規定上限，就必須支付罰金。

sentences.english: At present, the judicial practice there have been a fine implementation of the anti-expansion is sentence.
sentences.chinese: 目前，司法實踐中出現了罰金刑執行反擴張現象。

sentences.english: The judge imposed a fine of ten pounds on him.
Punishment of forfeiture has seldom been imposed and should be replaced by pecuniary penalty.
sentences.chinese: 沒收財產刑適用極少，應以罰金刑取代之。

sentences.english: Chapter three address the idea of detailing the fine penalty on unit crime.
sentences.chinese: 第三章單位犯罪罰金刑細化之思路。

sentences.english: KoSa pleaded guilty and paid a C$1.5 million fine.
sentences.chinese: 科莎公司認罪並支付150萬加元的罰金。

sentences.english: if death is caused, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than 10 years and shall also be fined.
sentences.chinese: 造成就診人死亡的，處十年以上有期徒刑，並處罰金。

definition: to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to reduce or waive (taxes, punishment, rent, tuition etc)
